mapper.insert: insert into task_scheduler (group_id, task_name, task_type, task_desc, task_cron, task_fire_time, task_next_fire_time, task_enable, create_time, operator) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskCron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskNextFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update task_scheduler set group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_desc = #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_cron = #{taskCron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_fire_time = #{taskFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_next_fire_time = #{taskNextFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_enable = #{taskEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, group_id, task_name, task_type, task_desc, task_cron, task_fire_time, task_next_fire_time, task_enable, create_time, operator from task_scheduler where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
